features: Folding Poles: Lightweight with the smallest pack size. Ideal poles for climbing, trail running, small tours or to take along on the road
Trigger Shark 2.0: Superior comfort, maximum power transfer, easy handling
Trigger Shark Active Strap: Active Lining - breathable soft inner material. Optimized shape, one Piece -360° inner hand - no overlapping material direct and straight grip contact
Fin Vario interchangeable basket for use in any condition - Fits 8mm and 9mm cones
